attributes.action: introduce Developed Vetting procedures for all serving and prospective Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Petition is to ensure the safety of sensitive information and intelligence. In the light of the recent public revelations relating to alleged 'Dodgy Dossiers' of Important Intelligence matters, as revealed during the current Chilcot Enquiry - whereby an ex-Cabinet Minister and Senior Civil Servants alleged that Parliament had been misled - coupled with the current, unresolved  scandals of some MP's abusing their claims system, serving and prospective MP's should be Developed Vetted in the same way as police officers and civil servants are required to, before taking up office.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
